abstractText: This illuminated Nepalese paper manuscript contains a collection of four dhāraṇis related to various goddesses, each represented in the illuminations at the beginning of the four texts (Vajravārāhīhṛdaya, Vajranairātmādevīhṛdayamantra, Sarvabuddhaḍākinīhṛdayamantra and Ugratārāhṛdaya).
abstractShort: This illuminated Nepalese paper manuscript contains a collection of four dhāraṇis related to various goddesses, each represented
title: Collection of Dhāraṇis
